    withdraw System Setup

    here are you will be able to setup withdraw settings:

    • List
    • Add New

    Number1: to go to add new withdrawal method
    Number2: to edit the exist withdrawal method
    Number3: to active or inactive the target method

    Number1: select the withdrawal method image, it will be used in withdrawal cards
    Number2: select the withdrawal method name, EX: Paypal
    Number3: select the withdrawal method currency name, EX: USD
    Number4: what is exchange rate to USD, for our example will be : 1
    Number5: how long time to approve the withdraw in days EX: 7,

    All amount in these fields are in your new method

    Number1: Minium amount to withdraw, EX: 5
    Number2: Maximum amount to withdraw, EX: 500
    Number3, Number4: if withdrawal method requires charge amount fee you can choice one of these fields
    fixed amount of charge or percentage of the requested withdraw amount.

    Number1: if you want to add notes for users in withdraw process, EX: Enter your valid paypal mail,

    if withdrawal method requires users to inter any data in withdraw process

    Number2: the input value, EX: email address
    Number3: what is the type of the input, Text, Textarea, File
    Number4: that is to define is it required to fill or not
    Number5: to add more fields,
    if you want to delete the fields: click on "X" button
